attributes.action: instruct the Secretary of State for Transport to establish a post within the Department of Transport with direct responsibility to ensure the implementation and development of the National Motorcycle Strategy, and improve inter departmental cooperation on such issues as motorcycle safety and integration into transport policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the publication of the National Motorcycle Strategy in 2005 Government action on facilitating the use of motorcycles has stagnated. The appointment of a civil servant to oversee the implementation and improvement of the strategy will kick start a new Government approach to the use of both motorcycles and scooters.
